title: [Medicine] COVID-19 can be transmitted in the womb. A baby girl in Texas -- born prematurely to a mother with COVID-19 -- is the strongest evidence to date that intrauterine (in the womb) transmission of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) can occur, according to a new report.
[Biology] 49 different SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibodies discovered, characterized, and submitted to manufacturers using 2 parallel workflows taking place over 18 days
